b'We are so thankful for our #BurlingtonDeals fans! To show how thankful we are, we are giving 5 of you a chance to win a $200 Burlington gift card for you AND a friend!
 
How to Enter:
 
1. Tag someone that you are thankful for in the comments below

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Legal residents of the 50 United States (Puerto Rico & D.C.) 18 years and older. Ends 11/28/2020. To enter and for Official Rules, including odds, and prize descriptions, visit https://bit.ly/2Hgrp0i. Void where prohibited.'
